title: Adaptive Training Development Framework: Mastery Model-Based Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level language proficiency and self-directed learning experience
context.additional_context: A course optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, providing personalized feedback and step-by-step training through learner behavior observation

learning_goals: Learners can apply the target language’s grammatical structures in an adaptive training system with over 80% accuracy, achieving proficiency benchmarks.
Within four weeks, learners can demonstrate language application cases using the mastery model’s step-by-step feedback mechanism through project-based assessment tasks.
Learners can autonomously manage personalized learning paths with a completion rate of over 75% on average in a smartphone-based interface.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
